quote: Wondering where Ranger was now, when I needed him. Why wasn’t he here, insisting on locking me up in a safe house? Now that my hamster’s cage was clean, I’d be happy to oblige.
quote_letters: WONDERING WHERE RANGER WAS NOW WHEN I NEEDED HIM WHY WASNT HE HERE INSISTING ON LOCKING ME UP IN A SAFE HOUSE NOW THAT MY HAMSTERS CAGE WAS CLEAN ID BE HAPPY TO OBLIGE
